meanings.definition: Using or able to use only one language.
meanings.sent1: She is unilingual and can only speak English.
meanings.sent2: The unilingual student struggled in the multilingual classroom.
meanings.sent3: The unilingual parrot only knew how to say 'hello'.
meanings.sent4: His unilingual computer program could only process English text.
meanings.sent5: The unilingual sign was confusing to non-English speakers.

meanings.definition: Speaking or writing only one language.
meanings.sent1: The unilingual author wrote all her books in French.
meanings.sent2: Being unilingual can sometimes limit job opportunities.
meanings.sent3: The unilingual poet found inspiration in the simplicity of one language.
meanings.sent4: Her unilingual diary captured her thoughts in a single language.
meanings.sent5: The unilingual conversation was easy to follow for those who spoke the same language.
